div.style: width:100%; height:100%; font-family:'Courier New', monospace; color:#2d2a24; padding:10px; box-sizing:border-box; display:flex; flex-direction:column; gap:14px;
flex:1 1 320px; background:#fdf9ec; border:1.5px solid #2d2a24; border-radius:14px; padding:16px; box-shadow:1px 1px 0 rgba(0,0,0,0.15); position:relative;

width:160px; height:240px; margin:0 auto; position:relative; background:linear-gradient(180deg,#e5b165 0%,#c27a34 50%,#a55e20 100%); border-radius:24px 24px 12px 12px; border:3px solid #2d2a24; box-shadow:inset 0 0 10px rgba(0,0,0,0.2);
position:absolute; top:-26px; left:42px; width:76px; height:34px; background:#f6ecd8; border:2px solid #2d2a24; border-radius:12px 12px 8px 8px; box-shadow:inset 0 0 6px rgba(0,0,0,0.25);

position:absolute; top:90px; left:18px; width:124px; height:64px; background:#fdf9ec; border:1.5px solid #2d2a24; border-radius:10px; display:flex; align-items:center; justify-content:center; text-align:center; padding:4px; box-sizing:border-box;
position:absolute; bottom:12px; left:24px; width:112px; height:28px; background:rgba(255,255,255,0.12); border-radius:8px; border:1px dashed rgba(45,42,36,0.35);

position:absolute; right:12px; bottom:12px; background:#fff7c2; border:1.2px solid #2d2a24; border-radius:10px; padding:8px 10px; width:150px; font-size:13px; line-height:1.4; box-shadow:2px 2px 0 rgba(0,0,0,0.18);

div.div:
Label: C4H8O2
Odor: rancid butter / vomit
One drop ruins batch.
- Purpose: sabotage insurance; not part of rose line.
